Config¶

Dev config settings for building and releasing

VERSION = '1.0.0' #: 
SOURCE_DIR = os.path.realpath('./grindless') #:
SCRIPTS_DIR = os.path.join(SOURCE_DIR, 'scripts') #:
CONFIGS_DIR = os.path.join(SOURCE_DIR, 'settings') #:
TEMPLATES_DIR = os.path.join(SOURCE_DIR, 'datapacks/grindless/templates') #:
DIST_DIR = os.path.realpath('./build') #:
ZIPS_DIR = os.path.realpath('./releases') #:
REGIONS_DIR = os.path.join(CONFIGS_DIR, 'regions') #:
REGION_TEMPLATE_PATH = os.path.join(TEMPLATES_DIR, 'region.jinja') #:
DIST_REGION_FNS_DIR = os.path.join(DIST_DIR,  'data/grindless/functions/regions')  #:
grindless.config.VERSION = '1.0.0'¶
grindless.config.SOURCE_DIR = /abs/path/to/grindless/grindless¶
grindless.config.SCRIPTS_DIR = /abs/path/to/grindless/grindless/scripts¶
grindless.config.CONFIGS_DIR = /abs/path/to/grindless/grindless/settings¶
grindless.config.TEMPLATES_DIR = /abs/path/to/grindless/grindless/datapacks/grindless/templates¶
grindless.config.DIST_DIR = /abs/path/to/grindless/grindless/datapacks/grindless/templates¶
grindless.config.ZIPS_DIR = /abs/path/to/grindless/grindless/datapacks/grindless/templates¶
